mainScreenSloganFirst.title: In the age of rapid development of IT technologies and e-commerce, every enterprise needs a website or web application for their company.

mainScreenSloganSecond.title: The website is the face of the company, an irreplaceable employee working 24/7.

mainScreenSloganThird.title: We will create a website for you that will earn.

mainScreenSloganFourth.title: The very site that will make your business successful.

sloganText.text: «If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses.»

cardTitle.title: What do we do and what can we do for you ?

cardTextA.text: Landing Pages, Single Page Sites, SPA Web Apps

cardTextB.text: Multi-page sites, MPA and PWA web applications

cardTextF.text: Launch and maintenance of online schools

cardTextBackSideA.text: We will create a business card website or a landing page for your product. Everything is short and to the point on one page. Both Tilda and HTML/BEM, CSS/SCSS/SASS, Pixel Perfect, Vue, JavaScript, Typescript, Coffescript, React JS, React Native, Bootstrap, TailWind, Webpack, Gulp, GIT, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Figma and others.

cardTextBackSideB.text: Websites and web applications for serious companies, with the ability to implement scalable projects for any task.

cardTextBackSideC.text: We will take care of all the maintenance, updating and maintenance of your site.

cardTextBackSideD-A.text: Creation of full-fledged online stores with goods, services or the creation of online storefronts.

cardTextBackSideD-B.text: A showcase is an advertising catalog, which contains detailed information about each item of goods available for order.

cardTextBackSideE-B.text: Preparation of technical specifications. Site audit.

cardTextBackSideE-D.text: Transferring a site from one platform to another.

cardTextBackSideF-A.text: Creation and configuration of course entities: trainings, lessons and assignments on the GetCourse platform.

cardTextBackSideF-B.text: Creation, setup and holding of webinars on the Bizon365 platform.

cardTextBackSideF-D.text: amoCRM setup. Synchronization of amoCRM with Bizon365 and GetCourse.

cardTextBackSideF-E.text: WhatsApp connection to amoCRM. Installing online telephony with Sipuni.

cardTextBackSideG.text: Creating, setting up and conducting webinars on the platform, setting up autowebinars.

cardTextBackSideH.text: Implementation of CRM systems. Connecting messengers to CRM. Integration of online telephony.

cardTextBackSideI.text: Payment systems: integration of payment systems on the site, for convenient online payment.

cardTextBackSideJ-A.text: Creating a Buyer Movement Map and implementing it in the funnel.

cardTextBackSideJ-B.text: Creation and configuration of SMS-mailing. Creating and configuring auto calls.

cardTextBackSideK.text: Creation and configuration of chat bots, integration of communication settings via Whats App, Telegram, VK.

cardTextBackSideL-B.text: Development and implementation of marketing activities suitable for your segment and your activity.

cardTextBackSideL-D.text: Work with bloggers and opinion leaders.

cardTextBackSideM.text: SWOT analysis, ABC analysis, development and application of anti-crisis measures.

cardTextBackSideN-A.text: Creating a sales department, increasing conversions, increasing market share, improving the skills and competence of the sales department.

cardTextBackSideN-B.text: Creation and expansion of the customer funnel.

cardTextBackSideO.text: Calling a potential base of cold customers, sending out CPs, creating a funnel of customers.

cardTextBackSideP-A.text: Sale, installation and configuration of licensed software.

cardTextBackSideP-B.text: Tuning, optimizing and upgrading your equipment.
